xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: This module provides utility functions on items. For example, it provides a function that allows estimating the size in bytes that a given item allocates in memory.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Matthias Brantner

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Computes the size in bytes of the given item in main memory.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $item the item whose size to compute.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: the size allocated by the item in bytes.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: item:size
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function item:size($item as item()) as xs:integer external
